item.title: Termux
item.description: Tested on Samsung Galaxy S21 on UI 5.0 (Android 13) Install termux from F-Droid Run simple commands pkg add wget wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sergeygalkin/termux/master/install.sh bash install.sh
item.content:
Tested on Samsung Galaxy S21 on UI 5.0 (Android 13)

  1. Install termux from F-Droid
  2. Run simple commands
pkg add wget
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sergeygalkin/termux/master/install.sh
bash install.sh
